posts.post_title: Looking for Cobb and Wagner postcards
posts.post_content: Going to consolidate the below posts I had. In particular, looking for dietsche fielding, m101-3 and Sepia, but interested in others! Please pm or email me at [url]pianni89@gmail.com[/url] if you have one thanks!!
